document.masterDocTitle: A catalog of Athericidae (Diptera) from Neotropical and Andean Regions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalog of Athericidae (Diptera) from Neotropical and Andean Regions

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Trichopalpus cinerascens Philippi, 1865
by subsequent designation ( Malloch, 1932a: 229 ).

atribasis Malloch, 1932a: 222–223
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype : male, Bariloche,
28.xi.-1.xii.1926
( NHMUK ?). Dist.: Chile .
Región de Ñuble
: Diguillín Province (Las Trancas); Región de La Araucanía: Cautín Province (Fundo Chacamo (
35 km SW Nueva Imperial
)); Región de Los Lagos: Llanquihue Province (Casa Pangue), Osorno Province (Bahía San Pedro, Portezuelo Puyehue); Chiloé Province (Tepuhuecu (
40 km SW Castro
)). Argentina . Neuquén Province ( San Martín de Los Andes ).

basale Malloch, 1932a: 226–227
.

28.xi.1929

subSubSection.paragraph:
=
Dasyomma ( Dasyomma ) atritarsis Malloch, 1932a: 234-235
. Holotype : male, Perales, Valparaiso , Chile , January 25 [= 1925], A. Faz (USNM?). Refs.: Coscarón & Coscarón, 1995: 91 (syn.)

Dist.:
Chile . Región de Valparaíso : Valparaíso Province (Perales)
;
Región de La Araucanía : Malleco Province (Galvarino)
; Región de Los Lagos : Llanquihue Province (Cayutué).

materialsCitation.collectorName: San Martin & Andes & Cerro Chapelco & Coscaron

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype : female, Neuquén , San Martín de los Andes , Cerro Chapelco ,
21-I-78
, col. Coscarón ( MLP ). Dist.: Argentina . Neuquén Province (Cerro Chapelco near San Martín de los Andes).

subSubSection.paragraph: Refs.: Coscarón, 1998: 340 (dist.).

Syntypes : Santiago Province (without locality precise), females
;
Aconcagua Province (without locality precise), males (no type specimens deposited in MNNC , presumably lost). Dist. : Chile
. Región de Valparaíso :
Quillota Province ( Quillota ), San Felipe de
Aconcagua Province (without precise locality); Región Metropolitana : Santiago Province (without precise locality).

Comments: Philippi (1865: 725) referred to some morphological characters for male and female and additionally he stated: “
Feminas duas in prov. Santiago , marem in prov. Aconcagua cepi.
” (Two females in Santiago province , males in Aconcagua province; both names referred to an old administrative provinces division of Chile , each one divided now into others provinces, and according this statement he had some specimens and then all were syntypes ).

Syntype : female, Región de Bíobio : Concepción Province : Concepción , 1903 without col. ( NHMUK ). Dist.: Chile . Región de Biobio : Concepción Province
.

hirticeps Malloch, 1932a: 230–231
.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Holotype : female, Valle del Lago Blanco , Chubut , Patagonia, J . Koslowsky ( NHMUK ). Dist.: Argentina . Chubut Province ( Valle del Lago Blanco ).

subSubSection.paragraph: Refs.: James, 1968: 5 (cat.); Coscarón & Coscarón, 1995: 77 (in key), 96 (com.); Woodley, 2007: 29 (com.).

immaculatum Malloch, 1932a: 225–226
.
